content: ebullience hat worsted 56226 by stacey winklepleck finished measurements us 5 3 75mm 16 circular and dpns or two 24 17 5 19 5 20 75 circumference × 8 8 5 9 circular needles for two circulars technique or height meant to be worn with 2-4 negative ease 32 or longer circular needles for magic loop technique or one size smaller than size used yarn to obtain gauge provincial tweed™ worsted weight 80% fine superwash highland wool 20% donegal tweed notions 250 yards/100g mc grey 27715 cc blue bird yarn needle 27575 1 hank each stitch marker needles gauge us 6 4mm 16 circular and dpns or two 24 20 sts and 24 rnds = 4 in stockinette stitch circular needles for two circulars technique or in the round on larger needles blocked 32 or longer circular needles for magic loop technique or size to obtain gauge © copyright knit picks ® all rights reserved for private non-commercial use only please see our website for terms of use www knitpicks com 1 800 574-1323 for pattern support contact customerservice@knitpicks com ebullience hat worsted notes this simple hat works up in a flash and the colors can be reversed to knit up two complete hats in two hanks of yarn use a wool yarn as suggested or try a soft cotton or acrylic for a chemo cap once the contrasting color is joined carry the yarn not being used up the back inside the hat without pulling it too tightly over the stripes until the pattern says to break the contrasting yarn directions with smaller needles and mc loosely co 88 96 104 sts pm for bor and join to work in the round being careful not to twist sts brim work 2x2 rib for 1 5 body change to larger needles and knit six rnds in mc change to cc knit three rnds change to mc knit six rnds change to cc knit three rnds break cc and change to mc for remainder of hat cont working st st knit all until piece measures 6 6 5 7 from co edge crown round 1 k6 k2tog to end 11 12 13 sts decrease 77 84 91 sts round 2 k all sts round 3 k5 k2tog to end 11 12 13 sts decrease 66 72 78 sts round 4 k all sts round 5 k4 k2tog to end 11 12 13 sts decrease 55 60 65 sts round 6 k all sts round 7 k3 k2tog to end 11 12 13 sts decrease 44 48 52 sts round 8 k all sts round 9 k2 k2tog to end 11 12 13 sts decrease 33 36 39 sts round 10 k1 k2tog to end 11 12 13 sts decrease 22 24 26 sts round 11 k2tog to end 11 12 13 sts round 12 repeat round 11 ending k1 0 1 6 6 7 sts finishing break yarn leaving a long tail with yarn needle pull tail through remaining 6 6
